subject: Selected wrong item on Order #SSN3408
description_text:
Good morning,

The control box I selected doesnâ€™t work with my Simsonn pedals. I already ordered the other option, but need to return this one.

conversations.body_text: Hi Juan Sosa,    We regret to inform you that your package has already been shipped, and we are unable to cancel it for you. We will attempt to intercept it, but success is not guaranteed. Thank you for your understanding.
